messages.message:
IPS blades are active on multiple layers.
IPS: IPS, Standard Threat Prevention.
R80 Gateway (or above) may have enforcement conflicts. See sk114434.

Anti-Bot, Anti-Virus, IPS, Threat-Emulation, Threat-Extraction, Zero-Phishing blades are active on multiple layers.
Anti-Bot: IPS, Standard Threat Prevention.
Anti-Virus: IPS, Standard Threat Prevention.
IPS: IPS, Standard Threat Prevention.
Threat-Emulation: IPS, Standard Threat Prevention.
Threat-Extraction: IPS, Standard Threat Prevention.
Zero-Phishing: IPS, Standard Threat Prevention.

detailedReason: Failed to run pre install fast install checks.

messages.message: Layer 'Application': Rule 9 will not be enforced properly, because of deprecated application(s) : UCBrowser

Layer 'Application': Rule 10 will not be enforced properly, because of deprecated application(s) : Supports VoIP , Orkut Widgets , BitTorrent protocol , Adds other software , Virtual Worlds , Share photos , Orkut Games , Streaming Media Protocols , Windows Messenger protocol , IRC protocol , Tunnels , Allows remote connect , Share links , Micro blogging , Web Desktop , Share Music , MySpace Lifestyle , MySpace Utilities , Voice Mail , Orkut Entertainment , Supports File Transfer , Share Files , MySpace Sports , Port agility , Sends mail , Supports video/webcam , Allows remote control , Opens ports , Orkut Utilities , Torrent Trackers , Gnutella protocol , Business Applications , Content Provider and Sharing , Orkut Popular , Yahoo Messenger protocol , Share videos , Used for Web-Based Support , Web Based Instant Messaging , Communication Standard , MySpace Games , Facebook Popular , MySpace Popular , Orkut Lifestyle , Supports IM , Orkut Sports , Supports Streaming , Transmits Information , Facebook File Sharing , MySpace Entertainment

Layer 'Application': Rule 10 : Source and Destination are ANY, with Services & Applications set to specific applications.
Best Practice: set Destination to Internet.

Anti-Spoofing is not configured for some interfaces and gateways. This will allow address spoofing through these gateways.,,Anti-Spoofing should be configured on the following objects:,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-ALT, Interface: eth2,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-ALT, Interface: Mgmt,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-ALT, Interface: eth5.515,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: eth8,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.26,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: Mgmt,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: eth1-01,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: vpnt10,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.513,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.35,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: eth2,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.514,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: eth1-01,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: Mgmt,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: eth8,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: bond1.26,....,.To see all the objects that need configuring look in the SmartDashboard, SmartDefense tab, under Anti Spoofing Configuration Status.

detailedReason: Failed to run pre install fast install checks.

Anti-Spoofing is not configured for some interfaces and gateways. This will allow address spoofing through these gateways.,,Anti-Spoofing should be configured on the following objects:,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-ALT, Interface: eth2,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-ALT, Interface: Mgmt,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-ALT, Interface: eth5.515,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: eth8,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.26,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: Mgmt,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: eth1-01,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: vpnt10,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.513,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.35,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: eth2,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-02, Interface: bond1.514,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: eth1-01,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: Mgmt,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: eth8,.Gateway: NGFW-BCP-01, Interface: bond1.26,....,.To see all the objects that need configuring look in the SmartDashboard, SmartDefense tab, under Anti Spoofing Configuration Status.
